'''Farm Hands''' are people that can be hired to work on your [[farm]], which are used to automate planting and harvesting berries. Many are unlocked by unlocking a certain number of berries, while others can be unlocked from certain shops. Once hired, farm hands will work until they are fired. This feature is currently in beta, and is subject to change.
==Unlocking Farm Hands==
{| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Name !! Hourly Wage !! Work Speed !! Efficiency !! Max Energy !! Unlock Requirements || Purchase Location |- | Alex [[File:Alex.png|20px]] || 140 {{farmpoints}} || 37 minutes || 1 || 10 || 8 Unlocked Berries || rowspan=4|N/A |- | Logan [[File:Logan.png|20px]] || 440 {{farmpoints}} || 19 minutes || 3 || 15 || 16 Unlocked Berries |- | Joey [[File:Joey.png|20px]] || 630 {{farmpoints}} || 10 minutes || 5 || 10 || 24 Unlocked Berries |- | Charlie [[File:Charlie.png|20px]] || 910 {{farmpoints}} || 7 minutes || 10 || 30 || 32 Unlocked Berries |- | Bailey [[File:Bailey.png|20px]] || 1,300 {{farmpoints}} || 5 minutes || 12 || 10 || 50,000 Farming Points {{farmpoints}} || Johto [[Berry Master]] |- | Kerry [[File:Kerry.png|20px]] || 1,900 {{farmpoints}} || 3 minutes 30 seconds || 16|| 50 || 100,000 Farming Points {{farmpoints}} || Hoenn Berry Master |- | Riley [[File:Riley.png|20px]] || 4,000 {{farmpoints}} || 2 minutes 20 seconds || 25 || 70 || 200,000 Farming Points {{farmpoints}} || Sinnoh Berry Master |- | Jamie [[File:Jamie.png|20px]] || 4,000 {{farmpoints}} || 1 minute 30 seconds || 5 || 65 || 20,000 [[Battle Points]] [[File:Battlepoints.png|15px]] || [[Battle Frontier]] |- | Jessie [[File:Jessie.png|20px]] || 8,300 {{farmpoints}} || 1 minute || 50 || 100 || 56 Unlocked Berries||N/A |}
== Stats == Farm hands have 4 important stats: '''Cost, Work Speed, Efficiency, and Max Energy''' (see below). At this time, farm hands recover exactly 1 energy when there is no work to do, and do not recover any more energy when fired.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Stat !! Description !! Usage |- | '''Cost''' || Hourly wage of the Farm Hand || Cost is deducted from your [[Farmingpoints|farm points]] every hour that the Farm Hand is employed. |- | rowspan=3|'''Work Speed''' || rowspan=3|How often the Farm Hand works || If the farm hand has energy, they will work and lose 1 energy each work period where they perform any action |- | Regardless of how many actions a farmhand takes during their active work period, a Farm will use 1 energy |- | If there is nothing to do or the Farm Hand is out of energy, they will not perform an action and gain 1 energy |- | rowspan=3|'''Efficiency''' || rowspan=3|How many actions the Farm Hand can make each work cycle || Harvesting a berry and planting a berry count as two separate actions |- | (Efficiency / 2) is how many berries a farmhand can harvest and replant in a work cycle |- | Farmhands will always prioritize harvesting berries over replanting them. |- | rowspan=2|'''Max Energy''' || rowspan=2|The maximum energy a Farm Hand can have at one time || How much energy a Farm Hand starts with. |- | The current energy of a Farm Hand can be seen by hovering over the hired Farm Hand |- |}
== Usage ==
Clicking on "Allowed Plots" opens a dropdown that allows you to select which specific plots the farm hand works on, where green is a space where they are allowed to work. Selecting the Berry Planting dropdown will allow the player to pick a specific berry to plant in those specific plots. Clicking the Harvest checkbox will allow that farmhand to harvest from those specific plots.
[[File:FarmHandExample1.png|right|400px]]
In this example, Alex and Logan are going to work on the farm together (once hired). Alex is planting [[Wacan]] berries along the outside, down the third column, and across the third row. Logan is planting [[Lum|Lums]] in the remaining spaces. Alex will harvest all berries along the outside, down the third column, and across the third row (which could be Wacans, [[Kasib|Kasibs]], etc.) and will put Wacans in those empty plots. Logan will plant Lums in the 4 plots they have been told to watch, but only if they are empty. Logan will not harvest any berries, and will do nothing, except plant those 4 empty plots with Lums.
